body_html:
I agree that stacking the full records probably doesn't make sense.

Could maybe consider passing an optional function that turns records into something that can be stacked, and then stacking them?
body_text:
I agree that stacking the full records probably doesn't make sense.
Could maybe consider passing an optional function that turns records into something that can be stacked, and then stacking them?
body:
I agree that stacking the full records probably doesn't make sense.

Could maybe consider passing an optional function that turns records into something that can be stacked, and then stacking them?
